item.description: Hi guys, This year we will be hosting the party at the White Horse Tavern in Brighton. They have promised us complimentary pool, great food and drink specials. As usual this will be a joint meetup with the Canadian, Kiwi and British expat groups. This party is always a good time, I hope to see you all there.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: 6th Annual Commonwealth Expat Holiday Party
